SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.repositories

Class CycleRepository

java.lang.Object
pt.uc.dei.repositories.AbstractRepository<CycleEntity>
pt.uc.dei.repositories.CycleRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CycleRepository extends AbstractRepository<CycleEntity>
Repository class for managing CycleEntity persistence operations.

Provides data access methods specific to cycle entities, extending the basic CRUD operations from AbstractRepository. This class handles all database interactions related to cycle management.

See Also:

    • findExpiredOpenCycles

      public List<CycleEntity> findExpiredOpenCycles()
      Finds expired cycles (end date in the past) that are still marked as OPEN.
      Returns:
      List of expired cycles that should be closed

    • hasOverlappingCycles

      public boolean hasOverlappingCycles(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate, Long excludeCycleId)
      Checks if there are any overlapping cycles with the given date range.
      Parameters:
      startDate - The start date to check
      endDate - The end date to check
      excludeCycleId - Optional cycle ID to exclude from the check (for updates)
      Returns:
      True if there are overlapping cycles, false otherwise

    • findCyclesWithFilters

      public List<CycleEntity> findCyclesWithFilters(CycleState state, Long adminId, LocalDate startDateFrom, LocalDate startDateTo, Integer limit, Integer offset)
      Finds cycles with advanced filtering options.
      Parameters:
      state - Optional filter by cycle state
      adminId - Optional filter by administrator ID
      startDateFrom - Optional filter for cycles starting after this date
      startDateTo - Optional filter for cycles starting before this date
      limit - Maximum number of results (optional)
      offset - Starting position for pagination (optional)
      Returns:
      List of filtered cycles
